Gplots library

library(gplots)
VennList<-list(A=list1, B = list2, C = list3)
venn(VennList)

VennDiagram library

library(VennDiagram)
pdf("VennDiagram.pdf", width=20, height=14)
venn.plot <- draw.pairwise.venn(area1 = 609, area2 = 1821, cross.area=250, c("Day 0", "Day 34"), euler.d = TRUE)
#grid.newpage()
dev.off()
